manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether your phone charging cables always fall down behind the table or off to the side at night? You always need to get up to look around on the floor trying to find the end of the charging cable to plug your phones in at night? Easy to fix that! Simply use a cable clips holder on your nightstand to keep charging cable in place. A good lifesaver keeps your computer cords bundled and untangled at home or office. 16 Pack Cable Clips Holder: Come with 16 pack different size cable clip holder with color selections, more size and more color for all family member Keep Your Desk Organised: Litte neat cable cord holder will help those cluttered cables and cords around your desk, TV, power strip, filing cabinets, computer or cell phone much nicer, and safer Multipurpose: You can use them as table cable organzier, as a pen holder, as toothbrush or flosser holders, flexible and easy to install wherever you want Soft Rubber & Sturdy Sticky Pad: Made of soft rubber and extra strong sticky pad which holds them securely, adhered easily to multiple surfaces Easy Use: Simply peel and stick your self-adhesive cable clip anywhere. Please kindly take a moment to sweep the surface before sticking them which make them holding tight Package Include: -16 Pack Cable Clips Holders *6 x One Slot Cable Holders *4 x Small Double Slot Cable Holders *2 x Lager Double Slot Cable Holders *2 x Triple Slot Cable Holders *2 x Five Slot Cable Holders Warm Tips(Very Very Important) : 1: In order to acheive best adhesive effect, please kindly Sweep the surface, prevent them from dust, wet, heat, oil. (Essential) 2: It is easier to pell off the protective film with a toothpick. 3: Before install the cable into clips, please press firmly to surface for 15 seconds when you stick it then waitfor about 24 hours. (Highly Recommend as the tap gets best performance after 24 hours).

Instruction Sweep surface with rubbing alcohol.(Essential)Pell off the protect film(It is easier to pell off with a toothpick).Apply to the surface, press firmly to surface for 15 seconds.Wait for 24 hours before use (Highly Recommend as the tap gets best performance after 24 hours) Damage Free Easily removed without leaving glues pad Multiple Use You can use them as table cable organzier, as a pen holder, as toothbrush or flosser holders
1-Year Replacement Program We stand behind the quality of all of our products and offer a 1-year replacement program for our OHill Cable Clips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These things STICK!
reviews.reviewText: These cord holders are actually very good quality. They used 3M adhesive tape, so they stick very well. If you're not careful they can pull the paint off the wall when removing, so don't try to pull them straight off. Try to twist them a bit and pry it up from one side very slowly. You get a great selection in this pack, and they are very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cable Clips for Perfect Cable Organization
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered these cable clips, and they have been an absolute game-changer for keeping my desk and workspace neat and organized. If you're tired of tangled cables and clutter, these clips are the perfect solution.What immediately impressed me was their simplicity and effectiveness. These cable clips are designed to hold your cables securely in place, preventing them from falling behind your desk or getting tangled. They are versatile and can be used on and around your desk, making cable management a breeze.The adhesive on the back of these clips is strong and reliable. I was initially concerned about them coming loose, but they have held up perfectly, even with multiple cables in each clip. The clips are also easy to install and remove without leaving any sticky residue behind.I love that these clips come in various sizes, allowing you to organize cables of different thicknesses. Whether it's USB cables, charging cords, or even headphone cables, these clips can accommodate them all.The result of using these cable clips is a clean and tidy workspace. No more crawling under the desk to retrieve fallen cables, and no more frustration from tangled cords. It's a small investment that has a significant impact on your productivity and the overall aesthetics of your workspace.In conclusion, these cable clips have been a lifesaver for me when it comes to cable organization. I can't recommend them enough, and I'm giving them a well-deserved five-star rating. If you're looking for a simple yet highly effective solution to keep your cables in order, these clips are perfect for the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A few things
reviews.reviewText: Simple stuff first; they work pretty well (per se) and they do their job. They were also pretty inexpensive for what you get.If you have the thicker USB cables, getting them into the 3 or 4 wire holder is a bit of a pain but they do seat easier in the 1 or 2 wire holders.It is nice that they decided to use 3M VHB on the holders, however…the VHB isn’t for low surface energy materials, so it wants to pull off of the holders themselves and it will not stick well to certain plastics. (This isn’t a mood killer for me since I have some LSE double sided tape at work but this may be problematic for others).If you’re attaching them to metal, tile, glass, Formica, etc., they will stick but the tape may let go of the actual holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love and use these more than I thought I would. They hold wires in place while still allowing you to pull the cable through when you need, which is good for charging cords. The 3M backing has held well even against fireplace brick. When you're sticking it to something, just be sure to wipe the surface and push hard for a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything sticks well. The multiple lines for a few of them hold really well. The individual ones are nice for organizing cables

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cable Organization - the bane of my existence...
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to try to tame the monster that is the giant squid of USB cables that I have created both at work and at home. As most folks don't have the time to read a dissertation reviewing something as trivial as these things, here are my takeaways:-These guys are large - much larger than I was expecting. Not too much of an issue, unless space is limited.-The assortment is good. I could have used several more of the multi-cable organizers, but again, not an issue for me.-Peel and stick was easy. No real struggle getting the backing off.-Adhesiveness to be determined. They seemed to be good, but several seemed to struggle to stay fully stuck to a painted cinder block wall. They would lose partial contact, and I pressed them back down to see them slowly lift off again. This could be due to a number of things (bent plastic organizer, uneven wall, something odd in the paint, maybe the sticky came off on my finger when I peeled the backing off...) so we'll see if they stick for the long haul.Overall, the product works well. Will update if anything changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product and nice price. Different sizes too choose from and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of my phone cord constantly being on the floor and having to try not to fall out of bed reaching for it. This works great. Still haven't had to remove one so I'm a bit worried about if it'll take the finish or paint off of things but hopefully not. Great quality for price
Cumplieron su objetivo: Organizar cables mediante un diseño discreto.¡Ojo! El adhesivo deja un poco que desear, permitiéndome opinar que vendría bien uno con mayor poder adherente.
Poderia ter mais opções, contudo recomedendo, principalmente pela qualidade.
Handy to organize the cables at home or in the vehicle.

reviews.reviewTitle: good product, however i didnt find any use for ...
reviews.reviewText: good product ,however i didnt find any use for the 5 slot ones since bigger cables cant fit in it
bought this, thinking it can help me my table cable management, ended up using the whole box for my house. Sadly, the sticker portion comes of on certain surfaces. Wish the glue will be stronger.
